parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.48

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Mission Information

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Returns the engine calculated size (terrain side length) of the current world ([[BIS_fnc_mapSize]] may return the same value, but is just a simple look up in [[configFile | config]]).

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[worldSize]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Number]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[private]] _size = [[worldSize]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code><template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>A round marker that should cover the whole map, placed in the center of the map, should have the following radius (a, b)</value></part></template>
[[private]] _radius = [[sqrt]] 2 / 2 * [[worldSize]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value><code>[[private]] _axis = [[worldSize]] / 2;
[[private]] _center = [_axis, _axis , 0];
[[private]] _radius= [[sqrt]] 2 * _a;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[BIS_fnc_mapSize]]
</value></part></template></root>
